attributes.action: Require government to refer to all spending as tax payers money instead of pretending it is theirs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Government publicity says "Gordon Brown/the government has pledged £billions for this or that. It is not his or their money, it is ours, the tax payers.

These statements should say "Gordon Brown/your government has pledged £billions of tax payers'/your  money for this or that.
